Name: Percentage of Payment Handled that are preceded by Request Payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of Payment Handled
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Payment Handled that are preceded by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled that are not dismissed
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled from all Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of Payment Handled with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled by STAFF MEMBER
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Number of Payment Handled grouped by org:resource
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities grouped by the last value of org:resource

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled by worker
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled followed by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled that are rejected
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of Payment Handled in relation to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Payment Handled is performed
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled done after Request Payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Average number of Payment Handled per case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled with an increment
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled with appeal
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average number of Payment Handled that are followed by Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled with penalty
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Total Payment Handled done by SYSTEM
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Fraction of Payment Handled that are dismissed
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total Payment Handled performed by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities == 'ADMINISTRATION' where ma is the last value of org:role

Name: Ratio of Payment Handled over Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Occasions how often the Payment Handled is performed
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities

Name: The ratio of Payment Handled that are not eventually performed
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Payment Handled' does not happen

Name: Percentage of variants containing Payment Handled that also contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Payment Handled in variants without Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled cases that never experienced Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Average performance time of variants containing Payment Handled versus variants containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Payment Handled occurring after multiple Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE due to rejections
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled following Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Payment Handled compared to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across all variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of Payment Handled to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in domestic trip declarations
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled where budget owner and supervisor are the same person
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Number of Payment Handled for travel costs actually paid versus reimbursed costs
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities > 0 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Payment Handled within two months after the trip
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Number of Payment Handled made per year
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities

Name: Average number of Payment Handled in a month
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'
